Helen Steffin

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: A. B. Scott
  3. Location of Family: Hubbell, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Fairbury, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 19 mos.
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: female
  9. Notes: July 13 article states, "The nineteen months old baby who was taken by Scott Essay, the Edgar editor, has been arranged for permanently."
  10. Source: Fairbury Journal, 29 June 1916; Fairbury Journal, 6 July 1916; Fairbury Journal, 13 July 1916.
